title: Bringing "Rank" status to an agument.
body:
Long story short.
Had a normal game, (Jungle amumu the new skin is fucking amazing.)
Ive been ganking all 3 lanes, farming well. And split pushing and getting dragons.

Top, A hecarim.
Keeps over extends and starts flaming me for not doing my job.
He had the audacity to call me bad when he has 2 kills 8 deaths. I was 5/0 snowballing bot and helping mid.
Eventually he scoughs and goes "Oh silver, typical." 

Lol, I have no idea who carried you into your division/League. Oh wait, your not ranked at all.
Seems like you tried but you've lost most games. And decided to normal for the rest of your life.

Do you guys get people like this?
Starts loosing an augment and decides to bring rank stats into it.

Come on, tell me your stories. :)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T10jEqO5,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-02T09:40:09.744+0000)**Lol, I have no idea who carried you into your division/League. Oh wait, your not ranked at all.** **Seems like you tried but you've lost most games. And decided to normal for the rest of your life.**


Really helps prove your point.

In Normal people use their rank all the time since they mostly just straight up assume everybody is either Bronze or Unranked (to be fair they have a point, but still, it doesn't make it reasonable) so their Silver arse can ride all and mighty like the bully kid who dominates the sandbox thinking he's the king of the world.

Tbh, the rank system we have in LoL is made up out of 2 components, the skill component and the grind component. So when someone is higher it doesn't automatically mean he is superior in terms of skill, but yes, there is always the case where he is just better than you in this game when he is walking around with a higher league tag.

However, belittling upon someone just because you have certain aspect better than another is just sad, it's easily one of the worst attributes one can acquire in his/her life. And no one should ever go there.

But really though, don't engage arguments online often, it's healthier that way.

I was passive the entire time.
I was playing a normal game with a lvl 23, something like that.
All I said was, "I have been splitting. Ive gotten dragons"
etc, and he kept flaming me calling me bad.

The guy is just a mad bad, after I made my point of him feeding and over extending he shut up.
